item.title: Can Ghana's new president meet the voters' high expectations?
item.description: John Mahama was elected on his pledges to solve the economic crisis but won't find it easy, analysts say.

item.title: Facebook and Instagram get rid of fact checkers
item.description: Meta says its platforms will instead rely on "community notes" from its users, an approach pioneered by X.

item.title: Trump Jr arrives in Greenland after dad says US should own the territory
item.description: The president-elect has said Greenland "will benefit tremendously if, and when, it becomes part of our nation".

item.title: Ros Atkins on...Elon Musk's political interventions
item.description: The BBC's Analysis Editor looks at Elon Musk's involvement in politics outside the US.

item.title: French far-right politician Jean-Marie Le Pen dies at 96
item.description: Le Pen - an unrepentant extremist on race, gender and immigration - founded the far-right National Front in 1972.
